body:
The debug mode works as expected. Then this isn't an issue anymore. But most people probably only compile TF in release and then see the same behavior.

Maybe a
```c++
ctx->allocate_and_append_output(output_shape, &tensor));
```
would solve these issues. Don't know a single operation, where the output shape isn't known in the very beginning of the function.

I close this for now (knowing such an issue exists).
